context: Energy company, 8,000 employees, facing increasing regulatory pressure on carbon emissions

request.purpose: Environmental risk management system including carbon tracking, regulatory compliance automation, and ESG reporting
request.justification: New regulations require detailed emissions reporting by 2026, current manual processes insufficient

decision_process.outcome: Critical gaps identified, immediate action required
Preferred solution selected with customization requirements
Approved with priority implementation for high-risk areas

business_impact.expected_benefits: Regulatory compliance assurance, reduced carbon emissions, improved ESG ratings
business_impact.projected_roi: Cost avoidance through fines prevention, potential revenue from carbon credits
